description:
Privacy-first, open-source TOTP authenticator for 2FA token management.

Flauth is a privacy-first, fully open-source TOTP authenticator for Android, macOS, Windows, and Linux. It provides a simple and lightweight solution for managing your 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication) tokens.

Features:

  • 100% Open Source: Transparent and trustworthy code.
  • Flexible Backups: Local text file export/import and WebDAV sync.
  • Privacy & Security: Secrets are encrypted and stored in the device's secure element (Android Keystore).
  • Modern UI: Built with Material 3, supporting adaptive light and dark modes.
